name: Slingshot (Navarre)
description:
A space-themed bullet hell where you cannot shoot!  You must instead use generated gravity around your ship to fling bullets back at you enemies.

An enemy fleet is attacking your homeworld, but all the allied gunships are absent.  All you have to defend your planet is a ship equipped with a gravity generator.  Use your gravity gun to fling the enemy's bullets back in their faces!

CONTROLS

WASD: Move ship
Hold left mouse button: Activate gravity gun

Slingshot created by Connor Timm (Navarre) for GMTK GameJam 2018

Music: Killers by Kevin Macleod [incompetech.com] (Creative Common Attribution License)
